name: fnfvelrnd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), crn(c0)), wa(wfn(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), crn(c0)))
-| wi(w0, wa(wfn(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c2)))
-| wi(wa(wfn(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), crn(c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), crn(c0)))
-| wi(w0, wa(wfn(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c2)))
-| wi(wa(wfn(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), crn(c0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wa(wfn(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wfn(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), crn(c0)))
-| wi(wa(wfn(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), crn(c0)))
-| wi(w0, wfn(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), crn(c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), crn(c0)))
-| wi(w0, wfn(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))

comment: A function's value belongs to its range. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
